title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat, specially designed for your comfort and safety. This space heater is perfect for seniors who want to easily stay warm during the colder months without any confusion.

With its compact size and sleek black color, this heater will effortlessly blend into any room in your home, dorm, office, or kitchen. It operates silently with a noise level below 45 dB, ensuring a peaceful and quiet environment.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater offers two power options to suit your needs. Choose between low heat at 750W or high heat at 1500W to achieve your desired level of warmth. It also features a fan mode for air circulation, keeping the room fresh and comfortable.

Safety is a top priority with this space heater. It is equipped with an overheat protection feature that automatically shuts off the heater if it gets too hot. Additionally, the tip-over protection ensures that the heater turns off when tilted beyond a 45-degree angle, providing peace of mind for you and your loved ones.

Measuring just 7.72 inches in width, 6.38 inches in depth, and 9.13 inches in height, this heater is lightweight and easy to move around your home. It weighs only 2.6 pounds, making it effortless to transport wherever you need it.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is ETL certified, guaranteeing its safety and performance. Its PTC ceramic heating element ensures rapid heat generation, allowing you to feel the warmth in just 2 seconds. The intuitive controls and built-in thermostat make it easy to adjust the temperature to your liking.

Experience the comfort and convenience of the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. Say goodbye to chilly rooms and hello to cozy warmth with this reliable and efficient heater.

Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat - the perfect heating solution for your home, dorm, office, or kitchen! This compact and lightweight heater is designed to keep you warm and cozy in the colder months. 

With its powerful heating options, you can choose between low heat (750W) or high heat (1500W) to suit your comfort level. Need some air circulation? Simply switch to fan mode for a refreshing breeze. 

Safety is a top priority with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater. It features overheat protection, ensuring that it automatically shuts off if it gets too hot. Plus, the tip-over protection will turn off the heater if it is accidentally knocked over, thanks to its shutoff angle of 45 degrees.

Measuring at just 7.72 inches in width, 6.38 inches in depth, and 9.13 inches in height, this heater is compact and easy to place in any room. Weighing only 2.6 pounds, it's effortlessly portable, allowing you to move it around with ease.

The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater is certified by ETL, so you can trust its quality and safety. Its sleek black color adds a touch of sophistication to any space.

Powered by electricity and equipped with a PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element, this heater quickly heats up your room in just 2 seconds. And don't worry about noise - it operates at a quiet level below 45 dB, ensuring a peaceful environment.

Elderly folks will appreciate the intuitive controls and thermostat feature, making it easy to adjust the temperature to their liking. The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater provides rapid heat generation and low thermal resistance, ensuring efficient and effective heating.

Don't let the cold weather get you down. Stay warm and comfortable with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. Perfect for elderly folks, this heater is designed to be easily accessible and user-friendly.
